description: These Italian-made skinny jeans are cut for a tapered silhouette and feature narrow leg openings. Their lightweight stretch twill is hand-sanded for an authentic timeworn look.
fitting_details: Skinny Fit: Sits slightly below the waist. Skinny through the thigh with a tapered leg and a narrow leg opening.
Size 32W has a 9¼" rise and a 12½" leg opening.
Belt loops. Zip fly with our signature button closure.
Five-pocket styling with signature metal rivets.
"Ralph Lauren"–debossed leather patch at the back right waist.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size 32W x 32L.
